member.name: D3D12_VIDEO_DECODE_OUTPUT_STREAM_ARGUMENTS1
member.summary: Specifies the parameters for the output stream for a video decode operation. is used for the same purpose, but does not provide a field for histograms.

member.name: D3D12_VIDEO_DECODE_OUTPUT_STREAM_ARGUMENTS1.pOutputTexture2D
member.summary: An representing the output texture. If decode conversion is enabled, this texture will contain the post-conversion output. If decode conversion is not enabled, this texture will contain the decode output.

member.name: D3D12_VIDEO_DECODE_OUTPUT_STREAM_ARGUMENTS1.OutputSubresource
member.summary: The index of the output subresource of pOutputTexture2D to use. This allows you to specify array indices if the output is an array.

member.name: D3D12_VIDEO_DECODE_OUTPUT_STREAM_ARGUMENTS1.ConversionArguments
member.summary: An optional structure containing output conversion parameters.

member.name: D3D12_VIDEO_DECODE_OUTPUT_STREAM_ARGUMENTS1.Histograms
member.summary: An array of structures that are populated with histogram data. The maximum size of the array is 4.
